lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The French government will present to parliament a major bill within two months to overhaul the Paris stock market, economics and finance minister Edouard Balladur said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: K. Prime Minister Margaret Thatcher and Chancellor of the Exchequer Nigel Lawson, said his government was also preparing a bill to liberalise the French insurance sector.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Balladur told an Economist conference that on the product side, a series of new contracts, including share options and forward contracts in European Currency Units (ECUs), would be introduced shortly for trading on the Paris bourse.
